title.narrative: Enhancing knowledge and understanding on all issues pertaining to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict (ECF)

description.narrative:
The project will provide decision-makers with all relevant information required to design policy initiatives conducive to the two-state solution and to enhance Israel¿s and foreign public knowledge and understanding of all issues pertaining to the key aspects of Israel¿s relations with the Palestinians.
The key elements are:
1. Maintaining and developing ECF¿s existing database 2. Creating an interactive web platform with extensive up to date information on the key aspects and developments of the conflict targeting a wide group of stakeholders such as decisions makers, civil society, media, academia and the broader public.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
